dmca.title: [EV1-C1562427M] FWD: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not identify (a) the
copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b) the material that is claimed
to be infringing, and information reasonably sufficient to permit the The Planet to
locate the said material. 

 
Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 10:34 AM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: [EV1-C1562427M] FWD: Copyright Infringement
Subject: [EV1-C1562427M] FWD: Copyright Infringement


==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. FWD: Copyright Infringement
Added by system at Friday, Oct 27 2006 01:14 pm
X-MailFrom: support@mail.ev1.net
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [207.218.192.114] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Fri Oct 27 14:15:55 2006
Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net
  (SMTP32) id A0000021C; Fri, 27 Oct 2006 14:14:44 -0500
Date: Fri, 27 Oct 2006 14:14:44 -0500
Message-Id: <200610271414.AA163971214@mail.ev1.net>
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: "Dial-up Tech Support" <support@mail.ev1.net>
Reply-To: <support@mail.ev1.net>
To: <abuse@ev1.net>
Subject: FWD: Copyright Infringement
X-Mailer: <IMail v6.05> 

MIME element (text/plain)
---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
From: "Adepi - Departamento de Internet" <adepi.internet@gmail.com>
Date: Fri, 27 Oct 2006 13:56:14 -0200 
 
*Dear Provider* 
 
ADEPI represents The Motion Picture Association (MPA) in Brazil, who represents the
following motion picture production and distribution
companies: 
 
*Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. 
Disney Enterprises, Inc. 
Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc. 
Paramount Pictures Corporation
TriStar Pictures, Inc. 
Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
United Artists Pictures, Inc. 
United Artists Corporation
Universal City Studios, LLLP
Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. * 
 
 
We have received information that you are apparently providing Internet access to
and possibly hosting pirate material at url: 
 
 
http://www.centralfilmes.com (69.57.142.186) <http://www.centralfilmes.com/> 
 
which is offering  copyrighted motion picture. The distribution of unauthorized
copies of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the
Brazilian Copyright Law # 9610/98 and Criminal Code, section 184. This conduct may
also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty
obligations. 
 
We request that you do the following: 
 
1) Disable access to this site;
2) Remove this site from your server; and
3) Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms
of Service Agreement. 
 
By copy of this letter, the owner of the above-referenced Internet site and/or email
account is hereby directed to cease and desist from the conduct complained of
herein. 
 
On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted
material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, that we have a good faith belief
that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law. 
 
 
Also, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this
notification is accurate and that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners
of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification. 
 
Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email should
you have any questions. 
 
We thank you for your cooperation in this matter.  Your prompt response is requested. 
 
Respectfully 
 
 
 
 
--
ADEPI - AssociaÃ§Ã£o de Defesa da Propriedade Intelectual Departamento de
Internet www.adepi.org.br Tel  (11) 3826-7479 Fax (11) 3828-1559
